name: py-docutils
description:
Docutils is an open-source text processing system for processing
plaintext documentation into useful formats, such as HTML, LaTeX, man-
pages, open-document or XML. It includes reStructuredText, the easy to
read, easy to use, what-you-see-is-what-you-get plaintext markup
language.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-readme-renderer
dependent_to.description:
readme_renderer is a library for rendering "readme" descriptions for
Warehouse.

dependent_to.name: awscli
dependent_to.description:
This package provides a unified command line interface to Amazon Web
Services

dependent_to.name: py-yolk3k
dependent_to.description:
Yolk is a Python tool for obtaining information about installed Python
packages and querying packages avilable on PyPI (Python Package Index).
Yolk3k is a fork of the original yolk. `yolk3k` add Python 3 support and
adds additional features.

dependent_to.name: py-recommonmark
dependent_to.description:
A docutils-compatibility bridge to CommonMark. This allows you to write
CommonMark inside of Docutils & Sphinx projects. Documentation is
available on Read the Docs: http://recommonmark.readthedocs.org

dependent_to.name: py-sphinx-rtd-theme
dependent_to.description: ReadTheDocs.org theme for Sphinx.

dependent_to.name: varnish-cache
dependent_to.description: This is Varnish Cache, the high-performance HTTP accelerator.

dependent_to.name: py-sphinx
dependent_to.description: Sphinx Documentation Generator.

dependent_to.name: opensubdiv
dependent_to.description:
OpenSubdiv is a set of open source libraries that implement high
performance subdivision surface (subdiv) evaluation on massively
parallel CPU and GPU architectures. This code path is optimized for
drawing deforming surfaces with static topology at interactive
framerates.

dependent_to.name: rdma-core
dependent_to.description: RDMA core userspace libraries and daemons

dependent_to.name: mercurial
dependent_to.description: Mercurial is a free, distributed source control management tool.

dependent_to.name: py-m2r
dependent_to.description:
M2R converts a markdown file including reStructuredText (rst) markups to
a valid rst format.

dependent_to.name: py-breathe
dependent_to.description:
This is an extension to reStructuredText and Sphinx to be able to read
and render the Doxygen xml output.

dependent_to.name: py-pybtex-docutils
dependent_to.description: A docutils backend for pybtex.

dependent_to.name: py-nbsphinx
dependent_to.description:
nbsphinx is a Sphinx extension that provides a source parser for *.ipynb
files.

dependent_to.name: py-mikado
dependent_to.description:
Mikado is a lightweight Python3 pipeline whose purpose is to facilitate
the identification of expressed loci from RNA-Seq data * and to select
the best models in each locus.

dependent_to.name: py-catkin-pkg
dependent_to.description: Library for retrieving information about catkin packages.

dependent_to.name: py-sphinxcontrib-bibtex
dependent_to.description: A Sphinx extension for BibTeX style citations.

dependent_to.name: py-restview
dependent_to.description: A viewer for ReStructuredText documents that renders them on the fly.

dependent_to.name: py-pynn
dependent_to.description:
A Python package for simulator-independent specification of neuronal
network models

dependent_to.name: py-docutils-stubs
dependent_to.description: PEP 561 based Type information for docutils.

dependent_to.name: py-botocore
dependent_to.description: Low-level, data-driven core of boto 3.
